sections.heading: Distribution
sections.text: without charge of Statutes of Nevada.

sections.heading: Distribution
sections.text: of Statutes of Nevada to Supreme Court Law Library.

sections.heading: Duty
sections.text:
of Legislative Counsel Bureau to stamp books distributed to public officers;

requirement that books be retained for use in office and delivered to

successor; duty of Legislative Counsel Bureau and Supreme Court to keep certain

records of distributed books; replacement of missing books.

sections.heading: Mailing
sections.text:
lists for publications; deletion of names unless retention requested; notices;

exception.
